Average Life Span of Animals

Life Span

Life span is the average quantity of years a certain animal lives. It might vary from one location to another. For example, dogs have a life span of 20 years.

Cats

Cats are amazing animals. They have a life span of 30 years, as seen on the chart. They are friendly, kind and awesome.

Elephants

Elephants have a life span of 60 to 70 years. Wow! . I am sure they are amazing with their long trunk.
